text: Sihamte ka’le, ‘si yadi curai karaiche tente (eya kono acaraita katha nahaya) iyara sahodarae'o iyara agata curai karaichila’. Kintu i'uchuphe prakrta bisayato nijara manate gopana raakhile arau sihamtara sanmukhata prakasa nakaraile. Te'om (mane mane) ka’le, ‘tomalokara arastha ati jaghan'ya arau tomaloke yi kai acha se'i bisaye allahe'i adhika aragata’
